metaDescription: Find top-rated financial advisors in Peoria. Expert guidance for retirement planning, wealth management, and investment strategies.

advisors.name: Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Michelle C Parker, CFP®|CEPA®
Edward Jones - Financial Advisor: Austin Sanford, CEPA® AAMS™

heroDescription: Peoria, Illinois, is a vibrant city known for its rich history and diverse economy.
landscapeDescription: Peoria's economy is anchored by healthcare, manufacturing, and agriculture. The city is experiencing steady growth, driven by innovation and a skilled workforce.
uniqueNeeds: Peoria requires investment in tech and healthcare sectors to enhance economic resilience and job growth.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Peoria's reliance on manufacturing poses risks; diversify into tech and healthcare. Real estate is stable but watch for market fluctuations. Tornadoes and flooding are concerns.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Peoria's GDP growth is projected at 2.5%, driven by healthcare and manufacturing sectors.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics
sections.description: According to Census (2023), Peoria's median household income is $56,000, reflecting a diverse economic base.

sections.title: Advisor Specializations
sections.description: Based on BLS (2023), financial advisors in Peoria are increasingly focusing on retirement planning and investment strategies.

sections.title: Cost of Living
sections.description: According to BLS (2024), Peoria's cost of living is 10% lower than the national average, making it an affordable place to live.

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Peoria's housing market is stable, with a median home price of $150,000 and steady demand.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Peoria offers a supportive business climate with incentives for startups and established firms alike.
